column2: an A.M. Eatery////Friends have been raving about this place for a while so I finally decided to give it a shot. Drove all the way from Katy to Montrose
column3: but it was well worth it! Don't let the 30 minute or whatever wait scare you
column4: it's worth it. I ordered and omelette and I also ordered the OMG French toast. Omelette was delicious
column5: and all the ingredients were fresh. The French toast was simply heaven on earth. My only drawback was the coffee selection. I ordered a vanilla latte
column6: and my brother ordered an iced coffee
column7: neither was great. Give this place a shot you won't regret it! Will be back very soon.
